name: It is NOT real: The Gameshow
name_original: It is NOT real: The Gameshow
description:
This game was made within a week for Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1, made with Unity!

It's a very short game in which you try to choose every statement that is not real! But be careful, choose a right statement and you lose!

If you are able to get all the NOT real answers, then you win the price inside the vault!
